summary: Golem's have appear in skyrim, battle these great creations to earn rewards!
descriptionHtml:
What is Golem Heart, you may ask...what you didn't? Well too bad I'm telling you anyway.Golem Heart was made to fill a void I felt in the world of Skyrim, it is true that golems are not entirely lore-friendly unless you are Dwarven , but they are all dead. 

My Patreon!!! https://www.patreon.com/user?u=182435 
 
(Update 0.4 adds 1 new golems and fixes the folder problem, the golem is the broken stone golem. This one is not craftable but the wild ones will drop the spell for them. There are only two wild ones so beware, they are rare.) 

 The large golems have all been removed for the time being, so please wait while I work on the next update. Golems are man made creatures made from, well, almost anything. They could be made from simple ice or stone, to even flesh and bone. Sadly not in Skyrim, so I took it upon myself to make this mod so everyone can see these beasts in action and maybe make a few of their own. 

 Mod contains 4 types of golems: stone, ice, bone, and flesh. The different golems have different models and textures, as well as different stats. The golems will be able to upgrade the spell tomes to the next tier of golems, stronger, faster and better in all ways. Maybe iron golems and maybe a dwemer one later on.

LOOKING FOR HELP! I'm mostly a beginner modmaker, I’m not a pro or anywhere close. I don't know scripting or even how to make meshes yet, I will definitely need help in these fields.

CreditDogtown1- for model the flesh golem
Vicn - for multiple models ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/65134/?[/url])
Gendundrup - for one model
Ruiuji - for the video!
Insect1 - for fixing grammar problems
author: Dudeinmask
